```
        #!/bin/bash

        if [ ! $1 ]; then 
        echo "Usage: #./dns-find-transfer.sh <domain>"; 
        exit; 
        fi

        for server in $(host -t ns $1 |cut -d" " -f4);do
        printf $server | sed 's/.$//'
        host -l $1 $server |grep "Address: " | cut -d: -f2 |
         sed 's/...$//'
        done

```
